    NOTE: Version 0

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterConfig

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getClusterConfig(java.lang.String id)
        Get cluster config from unique id.
        Parameters:
        id - id for cluster
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

      • getClusterConfig

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getClusterConfig(java.lang.String id,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String prod,
                                         java.lang.String test,
                                         java.lang.String unitTest,
                                         java.lang.String adHoc,
                                         java.lang.String sla,
                                         java.lang.String bonus,
                                         java.lang.String jobType,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> status,
                                         java.lang.String hasStats,
                                         java.lang.Long minUpdateTime,
                                         java.lang.Long maxUpdateTime,
                                         int limit,
                                         int page)
        Get cluster config based on user params. If empty strings are passed for prod, test, unitTest, adHoc, sla, bonus and hasStats, they are treated as nulls (not false).
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for cluster (can be a pattern)
        name - cluster name (can be a pattern)
        prod - if cluster supports prod jobs
        test - if cluster supports test jobs
        unitTest - if cluster supports unitTest (dev) jobs
        adHoc - if cluster supports ad-hoc jobs
        sla - if cluster supports sla jobs
        bonus - if cluster supports bonus jobs
        jobType - valid job types - Types.JobType
        status - valid types - Types.ClusterStatus
        hasStats - whether the cluster is logging statistics or not
        minUpdateTime - min time when cluster config was updated
        maxUpdateTime - max time when cluster config was updated
        limit - number of entries to return
        page - page number
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

      • createClusterConfig

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createClusterConfig(ClusterConfigRequest request)
        Create cluster configuration.
        Parameters:
        request - contains the cluster config element for this cluster
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

      • updateClusterConfig

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateClusterConfig(java.lang.String id,
                                            ClusterConfigRequest request)
        Update/insert cluster configuration.
        Parameters:
        id - unique if for cluster to upsert
        request - contains the cluster config element for this cluster
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with an HTTP error code

      • deleteClusterConfig

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteClusterConfig()
        Delete cluster configuration - this will throw an error since no params are sent.
        Returns:
        return a 4XX error

        Delete entry for cluster.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id for cluster to delete
        Returns:
        successful response, or one with an HTTP error code
